content:
Based on the new execution logs, I'll update the report:

EXISTING STRUCTURES
(No changes to existing structures from previous report, all structures remain the same)

###Iron Smelting Area at position(0,0)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Furnace 1 at position(0,0) processing iron ore
- Furnace 2 at position(2,0) processing iron ore

###Copper Smelting Area at position(4,4)
Consists of two furnaces:
- Furnace 3 at position(4,4) processing copper ore
- Furnace 4 at position(6,4) processing copper ore

###Power Generation System
Components:
- Steam engine at position(-7.5, 18.5)
- Boiler at position(-7.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at position(-7.5, 25.5)
- Connected by pipe groups at positions(-7.5, 15.5), (-7.5, 20.5), and (-8.5, 23.5)
- Extensive electrical network with multiple poles spanning positions from (-10.5,15.5) to (5.5,15.5)

###Research Lab Complex
Multiple labs positioned across the map:
- Lab at position(-7.5, 8.5) with 77 automation science packs
- Lab at position(-3.5, 8.5) with 26 automation science packs
- Lab at position(8.5, 8.5) with 178 automation science packs
- Lab at position(7.5, 12.5) with 22 automation science packs
- Lab at position(6.5, 17.5) with 30 automation science packs
- Lab at position(3.5, 19.5) with 30 automation science packs
- Lab at position(-3.5, 22.5) with 22 automation science packs
- Lab at position(6.5, 22.5) with 30 automation science packs
- Lab at position(10.5, 21.5) with 20 automation science packs
- Lab at position(10.5, 23.5) with 23 automation science packs

ERROR TIPS

### Research Technology Issues
- Research prerequisites must be completed before attempting advanced technologies
- Cannot research Logistics 2 without logistic science pack research
- Cannot research Electronics without Automation research
- Use correct technology names in the API (e.g., Technology.Logistics instead of Technology.LogisticSciencePack)
- Cannot research already completed technologies

### Science Pack Insertion Issues
- Use correct prototype names for science packs (e.g., AutomationSciencePack instead of SciencePack1)
- Ensure the science pack type exists in the game before attempting to insert
- Verify science packs are available in inventory before attempting to insert into labs

### Resource Management
- Monitor coal levels in furnaces to maintain continuous smelting operations
- Keep track of iron plate inventory before attempting to craft gear wheels
- Ensure sufficient materials are available before starting crafting chains
- Monitor coal levels in boiler to prevent power outages

### Crafting Efficiency
- Plan crafting sequences to maintain required intermediate products
- Maintain minimum iron plate stock before attempting to craft gear wheels
- Calculate required resources for automation science pack crafting chain
- Cannot craft items that require furnace processing (like iron plates) directly - must use furnaces

### Inventory Management
- Maintain sufficient coal reserves for both power generation and smelting operations
- Keep track of required ingredients for multi-step crafting processes
- When crafting items that require multiple steps, ensure you have enough base materials before starting
